TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventArrivedEventArgs extends System.Management.ManagementEventArgs

summary.span: 保留 事件的事件資料。

span.span: Holds event data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下例會非同步設定 WMI 計時器，以引發事件，每秒，並移除不再需要時。The following asynchronous example sets up a WMI timer to raise an event every second, and removes it when no longer needed. 定義數個[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]傳遞 WMI 事件時引發的事件。The defines several [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] events which are raised when WMI events are delivered. 委派會附加至這些事件，以處理傳入資料。Delegates are attached to these events for handling the incoming data. [!code-csharp[wminet_EventArrivedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_EventArrivedEventArgs/cs/EventArrivedEventArgs.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_EventArrivedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_EventArrivedEventArgs/vb/EventArrivedEventArgs.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NewEvent As ManagementBaseObject
public: property System::Management::ManagementBaseObject ^ NewEvent { System::Management::ManagementBaseObject ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得傳遞的 WMI 事件。

span.span: Gets the WMI event that was delivered.

value.span: 傳回 ，包含所傳遞之 WMI 事件。

span.span: Returns a that contains the delivered WMI event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 屬性值Property Value 表示 WMI 事件的物件。The object representing the WMI event. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
